author: aloeliger
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47341

#### PR description:

Taken from original PR description:

> This PR should allow for ZeroSuppression of the Trigger Primitives at the input of L1TCaloLayer1. It passed basic tests.

#### PR validation:

Original PR merged

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR is a backport to 15_0 for use in studies/emulation in data taking.
title: [15_0] ZS added to L1TCaloLayer1
